org.edgexfoundry.emf

Class EMFPublisher

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.edgexfoundry.emf.EMFPublisher

  • public class EMFPublisher
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents the EMF Publisher.

    • Constructor Detail

      • EMFPublisher

        public EMFPublisher(int port,
                    EMFCallback callback)
        Publish data on specified port number. start() API should be called before publishing the message.
        Parameters:
        port - port for publishing message/events.
        callback - EMFCallback

    • Method Detail

        event - Event

      • publish

        public EMFErrorCode publish(java.lang.String topic,
                            org.edgexfoundry.domain.core.Event event)
        Publish events on a specific topic on socket for subscribers. Note (1) Topic name should be as path format. For example: home/livingroom/ (2) Topic name can have letters [a-z, A-z], numerics [0-9] and special characters _ - . and / (3) Topic will be appended with forward slash [/] in case, if application has not appended it.
        Parameters:
        topic - Topic on which event needs to be published.
        event - Event
        Returns:
        EMFErrorCode

      • publish

        public EMFErrorCode publish(java.util.List<java.lang.String> topics,
                            org.edgexfoundry.domain.core.Event event)
        Publish an events on list of topics on socket for subscribers. On any of the topic in list, if it failed to publish event it will return EMF_ERROR/EMF_INVALID_TOPIC. Note: (1) Topic name should be as path format. For example: home/livingroom/ (2) Topic name can have letters [a-z, A-z], numerics [0-9] and special characters _ - . and / (3) Topic will be appended with forward slash [/] in case, if application has not appended it.
        Parameters:
        topics - Topic on which event needs to be published.
        event - Event
        Returns:
        EMFErrorCode

      • stop

        public EMFErrorCode stop()
        Stops PUB instance.
        Returns:
        EMFErrorCode

      • getPort

        public int getPort()
        Get the port of the publisher.
        Returns:
        port number as integer.
